statements: SELECT city_district, population_count FROM population_data WHERE district_id = 1
SELECT * FROM population_data ORDER BY population_count DESC
SELECT city_district, median_income FROM population_data WHERE population_growth_rate > 2.5
SELECT district_id, city_district, population_count FROM population_data WHERE median_income < 50000
SELECT * FROM population_data
SELECT * FROM population_data WHERE district_id = 5;
SELECT city_district, population_count FROM population_data WHERE population_count > 10000 ORDER BY city_district DESC;
SELECT district_id, population_count, median_income FROM population_data WHERE median_income BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY median_income DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT city_district, population_count, population_growth_rate FROM population_data ORDER BY population_count DESC, district_id ASC;
SELECT district_id, city_district, median_income FROM population_data WHERE city_district LIKE '%ton%' ORDER BY district_id;
SELECT * FROM cities WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT city_name, population FROM cities ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT district, city_name, population FROM cities WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT city_name, district, population FROM cities WHERE district = 'Downtown' ORDER BY population ASC;
SELECT city_name, population, district FROM cities WHERE district != 'Suburbs';
SELECT city_name, district, population FROM cities WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT city_name, population, district FROM cities WHERE city_name LIKE 'M%' OR district LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT city_name, population, age_group FROM cities JOIN demographics ON cities.city_id = demographics.city_id WHERE age_group = 'Young Adults' ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT city_name, district, gender, population FROM cities JOIN demographics ON cities.city_id = demographics.city_id WHERE population > 50000 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY district ASC;
SELECT city_name, SUM(population) AS total_population, MAX(population) AS max_population FROM cities GROUP BY city_name ORDER BY total_population DESC;
SELECT * FROM city_districts;
SELECT district_name, population FROM city_districts ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT district_id, average_income FROM city_districts WHERE average_income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM growth_trends WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT district_id, age_group, population_count FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT district_name, population, average_income FROM city_districts WHERE population > 50000 ORDER BY average_income DESC;

SELECT district_name, year, growth_rate FROM city_districts JOIN growth_trends ON city_districts.district_id = growth_trends.district_id WHERE year = 2021 AND growth_rate > 5 ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT demo_id, age_group, population_count, gender FROM demographics WHERE age_group = '18-25' AND gender = 'Male';

SELECT district_name, population, average_income, year, growth_rate FROM city_districts JOIN growth_trends ON city_districts.district_id = growth_trends.district_id WHERE district_name LIKE 'D%' ORDER BY year ASC, growth_rate DESC;

SELECT district_name, population, average_income, age_group, gender FROM city_districts JOIN demographics ON city_districts.district_id = demographics.district_id WHERE population > 30000 AND age_group IN ('18-25', '26-35') AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM city_districts;
SELECT district_name, population FROM city_districts ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT district_name, population, land_area FROM city_districts WHERE population > 50000;
SELECT * FROM population_growth WHERE growth_rate > 0.05;
SELECT district_id, avg_income FROM demographics ORDER BY avg_income DESC;
SELECT district_name, population FROM city_districts WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT district_name, median_age, avg_income FROM demographics ORDER BY avg_income ASC;
SELECT district_name, growth_rate, year FROM city_districts cd INNER JOIN population_growth pg ON cd.district_id = pg.district_id WHERE growth_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY growth_rate DESC, year ASC;

SELECT cd.district_name, dp.district_name AS from_district, migration_count FROM migration_patterns mp INNER JOIN city_districts cd ON mp.from_district_id = cd.district_id INNER JOIN city_districts dp ON mp.to_district_id = dp.district_id ORDER BY migration_count DESC;
SELECT demo_id, median_age, district_name, avg_income FROM demographics d INNER JOIN city_districts cd ON d.district_id = cd.district_id WHERE avg_income > 50000 ORDER BY median_age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM district_population;
SELECT district_id, population, growth_rate FROM district_population ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT city_name, population_density, average_income FROM city_districts WHERE population_density > 10000;
SELECT district_id, age_group, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE district_id = 3;
SELECT median_income, poverty_rate FROM economic_data WHERE median_income > 50000 AND poverty_rate < 10;
SELECT * FROM district_population ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT population, area FROM district_population WHERE growth_rate > 2.5;
SELECT city_name, average_income FROM city_districts WHERE population_density > 1000 ORDER BY average_income ASC ;
SELECT age_group, gender, SUM(population_count) AS total_population FROM demographic_data GROUP BY age_group, gender;
SELECT * FROM migration_data WHERE migration_count > 1000 ORDER BY origin_district_id, destination_district_id ASC ;
